5706  camera_horizontal[1] = camera_horizontal_temp[1];
5707 
5708  // (III) translate the camera
5709  camera_position[0] = x_min + .5 * x_dimension;
5710  camera_position[1] = y_min + .5 * y_dimension;
5711 
5712  camera_position[0] += (z_min + 2. * z_dimension) * sin(angle_factor * flags.polar_angle) * sin(angle_factor * flags.azimuth_angle);
5713  camera_position[1] -= (z_min + 2. * z_dimension) * sin(angle_factor * flags.polar_angle) * cos(angle_factor * flags.azimuth_angle);
5714 
5715 
5716 // determine the bounding box on the projection plane
5717  double x_min_perspective, y_min_perspective;
5718  double x_max_perspective, y_max_perspective;
5719  double x_dimension_perspective, y_dimension_perspective;
5720 
5721  patch = patches.begin();
5722 
5723  n_subdivisions = patch->n_subdivisions;
5724  n = n_subdivisions + 1;
5725 
5726  Point<3> point;
5727 
5728  compute_node(projected_point, &*patch, 0, 0, 0, n_subdivisions);
5729 
5730  Assert ((flags.height_vector < patch->data.n_rows()) ||
5731  patch->data.n_rows() == 0,
5732  ExcIndexRange (flags.height_vector, 0, patch->data.n_rows()));
5733 
5734  point[0] = projected_point[0];
5735  point[1] = projected_point[1];
5736  point[2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(flags.height_vector, 0) : 0;
5737 
5738  projection_decomposition = svg_project_point(point, camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5739 
5740  x_min_perspective = projection_decomposition[0];
5741  x_max_perspective = projection_decomposition[0];
5742  y_min_perspective = projection_decomposition[1];
5743  y_max_perspective = projection_decomposition[1];
5744 
5745  // iterate over the patches
5746  for (; patch != patches.end(); ++patch)
5747  {
5748  n_subdivisions = patch->n_subdivisions;
5749  for (unsigned int i2 = 0; i2 < n_subdivisions; ++i2)
5750  {
5751  for (unsigned int i1 = 0; i1 < n_subdivisions; ++i1)
5752  {
5753  Point<spacedim> projected_vertices[4];
5754  Point<3> vertices[4];
5755 
5756  compute_node(projected_vertices[0], &*patch, i1, i2, 0, n_subdivisions);
5757  compute_node(projected_vertices[1], &*patch, i1+1, i2, 0, n_subdivisions);
5758  compute_node(projected_vertices[2], &*patch, i1, i2+1, 0, n_subdivisions);
5759  compute_node(projected_vertices[3], &*patch, i1+1, i2+1, 0, n_subdivisions);
5760 
5761  Assert ((flags.height_vector < patch->data.n_rows()) ||
5762  patch->data.n_rows() == 0,
5763  ExcIndexRange (flags.height_vector, 0, patch->data.n_rows()));
5764 
5765  vertices[0][0] = projected_vertices[0][0];
5766  vertices[0][1] = projected_vertices[0][1];
5767  vertices[0][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,i1*d1 + i2*d2) : 0;
5768 
5769  vertices[1][0] = projected_vertices[1][0];
5770  vertices[1][1] = projected_vertices[1][1];
5771  vertices[1][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,(i1+1)*d1 + i2*d2) : 0;
5772 
5773  vertices[2][0] = projected_vertices[2][0];
5774  vertices[2][1] = projected_vertices[2][1];
5775  vertices[2][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,i1*d1 + (i2+1)*d2) : 0;
5776 
5777  vertices[3][0] = projected_vertices[3][0];
5778  vertices[3][1] = projected_vertices[3][1];
5779  vertices[3][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,(i1+1)*d1 + (i2+1)*d2) : 0;
5780 
5781  projection_decompositions[0] = svg_project_point(vertices[0], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5782  projection_decompositions[1] = svg_project_point(vertices[1], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5783  projection_decompositions[2] = svg_project_point(vertices[2], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5784  projection_decompositions[3] = svg_project_point(vertices[3], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5785 
5786  x_min_perspective = std::min(x_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[0][0]);
5787  x_min_perspective = std::min(x_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[1][0]);
5788  x_min_perspective = std::min(x_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[2][0]);
5789  x_min_perspective = std::min(x_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[3][0]);
5790 
5791  x_max_perspective = std::max(x_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[0][0]);
5792  x_max_perspective = std::max(x_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[1][0]);
5793  x_max_perspective = std::max(x_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[2][0]);
5794  x_max_perspective = std::max(x_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[3][0]);
5795 
5796  y_min_perspective = std::min(y_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[0][1]);
5797  y_min_perspective = std::min(y_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[1][1]);
5798  y_min_perspective = std::min(y_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[2][1]);
5799  y_min_perspective = std::min(y_min_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[3][1]);
5800 
5801  y_max_perspective = std::max(y_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[0][1]);
5802  y_max_perspective = std::max(y_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[1][1]);
5803  y_max_perspective = std::max(y_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[2][1]);
5804  y_max_perspective = std::max(y_max_perspective, (double)projection_decompositions[3][1]);
5805  }
5806  }
5807  }
5808 
5809  x_dimension_perspective = x_max_perspective - x_min_perspective;
5810  y_dimension_perspective = y_max_perspective - y_min_perspective;
5811 
5812  std::multiset<SvgCell> cells;
5813 
5814  // iterate over the patches
5815  for (patch = patches.begin(); patch != patches.end(); ++patch)
5816  {
5817  n_subdivisions = patch->n_subdivisions;
5818 
5819  for (unsigned int i2 = 0; i2 < n_subdivisions; ++i2)
5820  {
5821  for (unsigned int i1 = 0; i1 < n_subdivisions; ++i1)
5822  {
5823  Point<spacedim> projected_vertices[4];
5824  SvgCell cell;
5825 
5826  compute_node(projected_vertices[0], &*patch, i1, i2, 0, n_subdivisions);
5827  compute_node(projected_vertices[1], &*patch, i1+1, i2, 0, n_subdivisions);
5828  compute_node(projected_vertices[2], &*patch, i1, i2+1, 0, n_subdivisions);
5829  compute_node(projected_vertices[3], &*patch, i1+1, i2+1, 0, n_subdivisions);
5830 
5831  Assert ((flags.height_vector < patch->data.n_rows()) ||
5832  patch->data.n_rows() == 0,
5833  ExcIndexRange (flags.height_vector, 0, patch->data.n_rows()));
5834 
5835  cell.vertices[0][0] = projected_vertices[0][0];
5836  cell.vertices[0][1] = projected_vertices[0][1];
5837  cell.vertices[0][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,i1*d1 + i2*d2) : 0;
5838 
5839  cell.vertices[1][0] = projected_vertices[1][0];
5840  cell.vertices[1][1] = projected_vertices[1][1];
5841  cell.vertices[1][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,(i1+1)*d1 + i2*d2) : 0;
5842 
5843  cell.vertices[2][0] = projected_vertices[2][0];
5844  cell.vertices[2][1] = projected_vertices[2][1];
5845  cell.vertices[2][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,i1*d1 + (i2+1)*d2) : 0;
5846 
5847  cell.vertices[3][0] = projected_vertices[3][0];
5848  cell.vertices[3][1] = projected_vertices[3][1];
5849  cell.vertices[3][2] = patch->data.n_rows() != 0 ? patch->data(0,(i1+1)*d1 + (i2+1)*d2) : 0;
5850 
5851  cell.projected_vertices[0] = svg_project_point(cell.vertices[0], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5852  cell.projected_vertices[1] = svg_project_point(cell.vertices[1], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5853  cell.projected_vertices[2] = svg_project_point(cell.vertices[2], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5854  cell.projected_vertices[3] = svg_project_point(cell.vertices[3], camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5855 
5856  cell.center = .25 * (cell.vertices[0] + cell.vertices[1] + cell.vertices[2] + cell.vertices[3]);
5857  cell.projected_center = svg_project_point(cell.center, camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5858 
5859  cell.depth = cell.center.distance(camera_position);
5860 
5861  cells.insert(cell);
5862  }
5863  }
5864  }
5865 
5866 
5867  // write the svg file
5868  if (width==0)
5869  width = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height * (x_dimension_perspective / y_dimension_perspective));
5870  unsigned int additional_width = 0;
5871 
5872  if (flags.draw_colorbar) additional_width = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height * .3); // additional width for colorbar
5873 
5874  // basic svg header and background rectangle
5875  out << "<svg width=\"" << width + additional_width << "\" height=\"" << height << "\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" version=\"1.1\">" << '\n'
5876  << " <rect width=\"" << width + additional_width << "\" height=\"" << height << "\" style=\"fill:white\"/>" << '\n' << '\n';
5877 
5878  unsigned int triangle_counter = 0;
5879 
5880  // write the cells in the correct order
5881  for (typename std::multiset<SvgCell>::const_iterator cell = cells.begin(); cell != cells.end(); ++cell)
5882  {
5883  Point<3> points3d_triangle[3];
5884 
5885  for (unsigned int triangle_index = 0; triangle_index < 4; triangle_index++)
5886  {
5887  switch (triangle_index)
5888  {
5889  case 0:
5890  points3d_triangle[0] = cell->vertices[0], points3d_triangle[1] = cell->vertices[1], points3d_triangle[2] = cell->center;
5891  break;
5892  case 1:
5893  points3d_triangle[0] = cell->vertices[1], points3d_triangle[1] = cell->vertices[3], points3d_triangle[2] = cell->center;
5894  break;
5895  case 2:
5896  points3d_triangle[0] = cell->vertices[3], points3d_triangle[1] = cell->vertices[2], points3d_triangle[2] = cell->center;
5897  break;
5898  case 3:
5899  points3d_triangle[0] = cell->vertices[2], points3d_triangle[1] = cell->vertices[0], points3d_triangle[2] = cell->center;
5900  break;
5901  default:
5902  break;
5903  }
5904 
5905  Point<6> gradient_param = svg_get_gradient_parameters(points3d_triangle);
5906 
5907  double start_h = .667 - ((gradient_param[4] - z_min) / z_dimension) * .667;
5908  double stop_h = .667 - ((gradient_param[5] - z_min) / z_dimension) * .667;
5909 
5910  unsigned int start_r = 0;
5911  unsigned int start_g = 0;
5912  unsigned int start_b = 0;
5913 
5914  unsigned int stop_r = 0;
5915  unsigned int stop_g = 0;
5916  unsigned int stop_b = 0;
5917 
5918  unsigned int start_i = static_cast<unsigned int>(start_h * 6.);
5919  unsigned int stop_i = static_cast<unsigned int>(stop_h * 6.);
5920 
5921  double start_f = start_h * 6. - start_i;
5922  double start_q = 1. - start_f;
5923 
5924  double stop_f = stop_h * 6. - stop_i;
5925  double stop_q = 1. - stop_f;
5926 
5927  switch (start_i % 6)
5928  {
5929  case 0:
5930  start_r = 255, start_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f);
5931  break;
5932  case 1:
5933  start_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q), start_g = 255;
5934  break;
5935  case 2:
5936  start_g = 255, start_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f);
5937  break;
5938  case 3:
5939  start_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q), start_b = 255;
5940  break;
5941  case 4:
5942  start_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f), start_b = 255;
5943  break;
5944  case 5:
5945  start_r = 255, start_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q);
5946  break;
5947  default:
5948  break;
5949  }
5950 
5951  switch (stop_i % 6)
5952  {
5953  case 0:
5954  stop_r = 255, stop_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f);
5955  break;
5956  case 1:
5957  stop_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q), stop_g = 255;
5958  break;
5959  case 2:
5960  stop_g = 255, stop_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f);
5961  break;
5962  case 3:
5963  stop_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q), stop_b = 255;
5964  break;
5965  case 4:
5966  stop_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f), stop_b = 255;
5967  break;
5968  case 5:
5969  stop_r = 255, stop_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q);
5970  break;
5971  default:
5972  break;
5973  }
5974 
5975  Point<3> gradient_start_point_3d, gradient_stop_point_3d;
5976 
5977  gradient_start_point_3d[0] = gradient_param[0];
5978  gradient_start_point_3d[1] = gradient_param[1];
5979  gradient_start_point_3d[2] = gradient_param[4];
5980 
5981  gradient_stop_point_3d[0] = gradient_param[2];
5982  gradient_stop_point_3d[1] = gradient_param[3];
5983  gradient_stop_point_3d[2] = gradient_param[5];
5984 
5985  Point<2> gradient_start_point = svg_project_point(gradient_start_point_3d, camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5986  Point<2> gradient_stop_point = svg_project_point(gradient_stop_point_3d, camera_position, camera_direction, camera_horizontal, camera_focus);
5987 
5988  // define linear gradient
5989  out << " <linearGradient id=\"" << triangle_counter << "\" gradientUnits=\"userSpaceOnUse\" "
5990  << "x1=\""
5991  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((gradient_start_point[0] - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
5992  << "\" "
5993  << "y1=\""
5994  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((gradient_start_point[1] - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
5995  << "\" "
5996  << "x2=\""
5997  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((gradient_stop_point[0] - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
5998  << "\" "
5999  << "y2=\""
6000  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((gradient_stop_point[1] - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
6001  << "\""
6002  << ">" << '\n'
6003  << " <stop offset=\"0\" style=\"stop-color:rgb(" << start_r << "," << start_g << "," << start_b << ")\"/>" << '\n'
6004  << " <stop offset=\"1\" style=\"stop-color:rgb(" << stop_r << "," << stop_g << "," << stop_b << ")\"/>" << '\n'
6005  << " </linearGradient>" << '\n';
6006 
6007  // draw current triangle
6008  double x1 = 0, y1 = 0, x2 = 0, y2 = 0;
6009  double x3 = cell->projected_center[0];
6010  double y3 = cell->projected_center[1];
6011 
6012  switch (triangle_index)
6013  {
6014  case 0:
6015  x1 = cell->projected_vertices[0][0], y1 = cell->projected_vertices[0][1], x2 = cell->projected_vertices[1][0], y2 = cell->projected_vertices[1][1];
6016  break;
6017  case 1:
6018  x1 = cell->projected_vertices[1][0], y1 = cell->projected_vertices[1][1], x2 = cell->projected_vertices[3][0], y2 = cell->projected_vertices[3][1];
6019  break;
6020  case 2:
6021  x1 = cell->projected_vertices[3][0], y1 = cell->projected_vertices[3][1], x2 = cell->projected_vertices[2][0], y2 = cell->projected_vertices[2][1];
6022  break;
6023  case 3:
6024  x1 = cell->projected_vertices[2][0], y1 = cell->projected_vertices[2][1], x2 = cell->projected_vertices[0][0], y2 = cell->projected_vertices[0][1];
6025  break;
6026  default:
6027  break;
6028  }
6029 
6030  out << " <path d=\"M "
6031  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((x1 - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
6032  << ' '
6033  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((y1 - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
6034  << " L "
6035  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((x2 - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
6036  << ' '
6037  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((y2 - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
6038  << " L "
6039  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((x3 - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
6040  << ' '
6041  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((y3 - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
6042  << " L "
6043  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + ((x1 - x_min_perspective) / x_dimension_perspective) * (width - (width/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent) + ((width/100.) * margin_in_percent))
6044  << ' '
6045  << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + height - (height/100.) * margin_in_percent - ((y1 - y_min_perspective) / y_dimension_perspective) * (height - (height/100.) * 2. * margin_in_percent))
6046  << "\" style=\"stroke:black; fill:url(#" << triangle_counter << "); stroke-width:" << flags.line_thickness << "\"/>" << '\n';
6047 
6048  triangle_counter++;
6049  }
6050  }
6051 
6052 
6053 // draw the colorbar
6054  if (flags.draw_colorbar)
6055  {
6056  out << '\n' << " <!-- colorbar -->" << '\n';
6057 
6058  unsigned int element_height = static_cast<unsigned int>(((height/100.) * (71. - 2.*margin_in_percent)) / 4);
6059  unsigned int element_width = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * 2.5);
6060 
6061  additional_width = 0;
6062  if (!flags.margin) additional_width = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * 2.5);
6063 
6064  for (unsigned int index = 0; index < 4; index++)
6065  {
6066  double start_h = .667 - ((index+1) / 4.) * .667;
6067  double stop_h = .667 - (index / 4.) * .667;
6068 
6069  unsigned int start_r = 0;
6070  unsigned int start_g = 0;
6071  unsigned int start_b = 0;
6072 
6073  unsigned int stop_r = 0;
6074  unsigned int stop_g = 0;
6075  unsigned int stop_b = 0;
6076 
6077  unsigned int start_i = static_cast<unsigned int>(start_h * 6.);
6078  unsigned int stop_i = static_cast<unsigned int>(stop_h * 6.);
6079 
6080  double start_f = start_h * 6. - start_i;
6081  double start_q = 1. - start_f;
6082 
6083  double stop_f = stop_h * 6. - stop_i;
6084  double stop_q = 1. - stop_f;
6085 
6086  switch (start_i % 6)
6087  {
6088  case 0:
6089  start_r = 255, start_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f);
6090  break;
6091  case 1:
6092  start_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q), start_g = 255;
6093  break;
6094  case 2:
6095  start_g = 255, start_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f);
6096  break;
6097  case 3:
6098  start_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q), start_b = 255;
6099  break;
6100  case 4:
6101  start_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_f), start_b = 255;
6102  break;
6103  case 5:
6104  start_r = 255, start_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * start_q);
6105  break;
6106  default:
6107  break;
6108  }
6109 
6110  switch (stop_i % 6)
6111  {
6112  case 0:
6113  stop_r = 255, stop_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f);
6114  break;
6115  case 1:
6116  stop_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q), stop_g = 255;
6117  break;
6118  case 2:
6119  stop_g = 255, stop_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f);
6120  break;
6121  case 3:
6122  stop_g = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q), stop_b = 255;
6123  break;
6124  case 4:
6125  stop_r = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_f), stop_b = 255;
6126  break;
6127  case 5:
6128  stop_r = 255, stop_b = static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + 255. * stop_q);
6129  break;
6130  default:
6131  break;
6132  }
6133 
6134  // define gradient
6135  out << " <linearGradient id=\"colorbar_" << index << "\" gradientUnits=\"userSpaceOnUse\" "
6136  << "x1=\"" << width + additional_width << "\" "
6137  << "y1=\"" << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * (margin_in_percent + 29)) + (3-index) * element_height << "\" "
6138  << "x2=\"" << width + additional_width << "\" "
6139  << "y2=\"" << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * (margin_in_percent + 29)) + (4-index) * element_height << "\""
6140  << ">" << '\n'
6141  << " <stop offset=\"0\" style=\"stop-color:rgb(" << start_r << "," << start_g << "," << start_b << ")\"/>" << '\n'
6142  << " <stop offset=\"1\" style=\"stop-color:rgb(" << stop_r << "," << stop_g << "," << stop_b << ")\"/>" << '\n'
6143  << " </linearGradient>" << '\n';
6144 
6145  // draw box corresponding to the gradient above
6146  out << " <rect"
6147  << " x=\"" << width + additional_width
6148  << "\" y=\"" << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * (margin_in_percent + 29)) + (3-index) * element_height
6149  << "\" width=\"" << element_width
6150  << "\" height=\"" << element_height
6151  << "\" style=\"stroke:black; stroke-width:2; fill:url(#colorbar_" << index << ")\"/>" << '\n';
6152  }
6153 
6154  for (unsigned int index = 0; index < 5; index++)
6155  {
6156  out << " <text x=\"" << width + additional_width + static_cast<unsigned int>(1.5 * element_width)
6157  << "\" y=\"" << static_cast<unsigned int>(.5 + (height/100.) * (margin_in_percent + 29) + (4.-index) * element_height + 30.) << "\""
6158  << " style=\"text-anchor:start; font-size:80; font-family:Helvetica";
6159 
6160  if (index == 0 || index == 4) out << "; font-weight:bold";
6161 
6162  out << "\">" << (float)(((int)((z_min + index * (z_dimension / 4.))*10000))/10000.);
6163 
6164  if (index == 4) out << " max";
6165  if (index == 0) out << " min";
6166 
6167  out << "</text>" << '\n';
6168  }
6169  }
6170 
6171  // finalize the svg file
6172  out << '\n' << "</svg>";
6173  out.flush();
6174 
6175  }
6176 
6177 
6178 
6179  template <int dim, int spacedim>
6180  void
6181  write_deal_II_intermediate (const std::vector<Patch<dim,spacedim> > &patches,
6182  const std::vector<std::string> &data_names,
6183  const std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> > &vector_data_ranges,
6184  const Deal_II_IntermediateFlags &/*flags*/,
6185  std::ostream &out)
6186  {
6187  AssertThrow (out, ExcIO());
6188 
6189  // first write tokens indicating the
6190  // template parameters. we need this in
6191  // here because we may want to read in data
6192  // again even if we don't know in advance
6193  // the template parameters, see @ref step_19 "step-19"
6194  out << dim << ' ' << spacedim << '\n';
6195 
6196  // then write a header
6197  out << "[deal.II intermediate format graphics data]" << '\n'
6198  << "[written by " << DEAL_II_PACKAGE_NAME << " " << DEAL_II_PACKAGE_VERSION << "]" << '\n'
6199  << "[Version: " << Deal_II_IntermediateFlags::format_version << "]" << '\n';
6200 
6201  out << data_names.size() << '\n';
6202  for (unsigned int i=0; i<data_names.size(); ++i)
6203  out << data_names[i] << '\n';
6204 
6205  out << patches.size() << '\n';
6206  for (unsigned int i=0; i<patches.size(); ++i)
6207  out << patches[i] << '\n';
6208 
6209  out << vector_data_ranges.size() << '\n';
6210  for (unsigned int i=0; i<vector_data_ranges.size(); ++i)
6211  out << std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[i]) << ' '
6212  << std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[i]) << '\n'
6213  << std::get<2>(vector_data_ranges[i]) << '\n';
6214 
6215  out << '\n';
6216  // make sure everything now gets to
6217  // disk
6218  out.flush ();
6219  }
6220 
6221 
6222 
6223  std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>
6224  determine_intermediate_format_dimensions (std::istream &input)
6225  {
6226  AssertThrow (input, ExcIO());
6227 
6228  unsigned int dim, spacedim;
6229  input >> dim >> spacedim;
6230 
6231  return std::make_pair (dim, spacedim);
6232  }
6233 } // namespace DataOutBase
6234 
6235 
6236

6242 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::DataOutInterface ()
6243  : default_subdivisions(1)
6244 {}
6245

6247 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6248 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::~DataOutInterface ()
6249 {}

6254 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6255 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::write_dx (std::ostream &out) const
6256 {
6257  DataOutBase::write_dx (get_patches(), get_dataset_names(),
6258  get_vector_data_ranges(),
6259  dx_flags, out);
6260 }

6268  get_vector_data_ranges(),
6269  ucd_flags, out);
6270 }

6357 
6358 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6359 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::write_vtu_in_parallel (const char *filename, MPI_Comm comm) const
6360 {
6361 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6362  //without MPI fall back to the normal way to write a vtu file :
6363  (void)comm;
6364 
6365  std::ofstream f(filename);
6366  write_vtu (f);
6367 #else
6368 
6369  int myrank, nproc;
6370  int ierr = MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myrank);
6371  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6372  ierr = MPI_Comm_size(comm, &nproc);
6373  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6374 
6375  MPI_Info info;
6376  ierr = MPI_Info_create(&info);
6377  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6378  MPI_File fh;
6379  ierr = MPI_File_open(comm, const_cast<char *>(filename),
6380  MPI_MODE_CREATE | MPI_MODE_WRONLY, info, &fh);
6381  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6382 
6383  ierr = MPI_File_set_size(fh, 0); // delete the file contents
6384  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6385  // this barrier is necessary, because otherwise others might already
6386  // write while one core is still setting the size to zero.
6387  ierr = MPI_Barrier(comm);
6388  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6389  ierr = MPI_Info_free(&info);
6390  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6391 
6392  unsigned int header_size;
6393 
6394  //write header
6395  if (myrank==0)
6396  {
6397  std::stringstream ss;
6398  DataOutBase::write_vtu_header(ss, vtk_flags);
6399  header_size = ss.str().size();
6400  ierr = MPI_File_write(fh, const_cast<char *>(ss.str().c_str()), header_size,
6401  MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
6402  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6403  }
6404 
6405  ierr = MPI_Bcast(&header_size, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED, 0, comm);
6406  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6407 
6408  ierr = MPI_File_seek_shared( fh, header_size, MPI_SEEK_SET );
6409  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6410  {
6411  std::stringstream ss;
6412  DataOutBase::write_vtu_main (get_patches(), get_dataset_names(),
6413  get_vector_data_ranges(),
6414  vtk_flags, ss);
6415  ierr = MPI_File_write_ordered(fh, const_cast<char *>(ss.str().c_str()),
6416  ss.str().size(), MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
6417  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6418  }
6419 
6420  //write footer
6421  if (myrank==0)
6422  {
6423  std::stringstream ss;
6424  DataOutBase::write_vtu_footer(ss);
6425  unsigned int footer_size = ss.str().size();
6426  ierr = MPI_File_write_shared(fh, const_cast<char *>(ss.str().c_str()),
6427  footer_size, MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
6428  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6429  }
6430  ierr = MPI_File_close( &fh );
6431  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6432 #endif
6433 }
6434 
6435 
6436 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6437 void
6438 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::write_pvtu_record (std::ostream &out,
6439  const std::vector<std::string> &piece_names) const
6440 {
6441  DataOutBase::write_pvtu_record(out,
6442  piece_names,
6443  get_dataset_names(),
6444  get_vector_data_ranges());
6445 }
6446 
6447

6449 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6450 void
6451 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6452 write_pvd_record (std::ostream &out,
6453  const std::vector<std::pair<double,std::string> > &times_and_names)
6454 {
6455  DataOutBase::write_pvd_record(out, times_and_names);
6456 }

6490 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6491 write_deal_II_intermediate (std::ostream &out) const
6492 {

6494  get_vector_data_ranges(),
6495  deal_II_intermediate_flags, out);
6496 }
6497 
6498 
6499 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6500 XDMFEntry DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6501 create_xdmf_entry (const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6502  const std::string &h5_filename, const double cur_time, MPI_Comm comm) const
6503 {
6504  return create_xdmf_entry(data_filter, h5_filename, h5_filename, cur_time, comm);
6505 }
6506 
6507 
6508 
6509 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6510 XDMFEntry DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6511 create_xdmf_entry (const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6512  const std::string &h5_mesh_filename,
6513  const std::string &h5_solution_filename,
6514  const double cur_time,
6515  MPI_Comm comm) const
6516 {
6517  unsigned int local_node_cell_count[2], global_node_cell_count[2];
6518  int myrank;
6519 
6520 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_HDF5
6521  // throw an exception, but first make
6522  // sure the compiler does not warn about
6523  // the now unused function arguments
6524  (void)data_filter;
6525  (void)h5_mesh_filename;
6526  (void)h5_solution_filename;
6527  (void)cur_time;
6528  (void)comm;
6529  AssertThrow(false, ExcMessage ("XDMF support requires HDF5 to be turned on."));
6530 #endif
6531  AssertThrow(dim == 2 || dim == 3, ExcMessage ("XDMF only supports 2 or 3 dimensions."));
6532 
6533  local_node_cell_count[0] = data_filter.n_nodes();
6534  local_node_cell_count[1] = data_filter.n_cells();
6535 
6536  // And compute the global total
6537 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6538  int ierr = MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myrank);
6539  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6540  ierr = MPI_Allreduce(local_node_cell_count, global_node_cell_count, 2, MPI_UNSIGNED, MPI_SUM, comm);
6541  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6542 #else
6543  myrank = 0;
6544  global_node_cell_count[0] = local_node_cell_count[0];
6545  global_node_cell_count[1] = local_node_cell_count[1];
6546 #endif
6547 
6548  // Output the XDMF file only on the root process
6549  if (myrank == 0)
6550  {
6551  XDMFEntry entry(h5_mesh_filename, h5_solution_filename, cur_time, global_node_cell_count[0], global_node_cell_count[1], dim);
6552  unsigned int n_data_sets = data_filter.n_data_sets();
6553 
6554  // The vector names generated here must match those generated in the HDF5 file
6555  unsigned int i;
6556  for (i=0; i<n_data_sets; ++i)
6557  {
6558  entry.add_attribute(data_filter.get_data_set_name(i), data_filter.get_data_set_dim(i));
6559  }
6560 
6561  return entry;
6562  }
6563  else
6564  {
6565  return XDMFEntry();
6566  }
6567 }
6568 
6569 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6570 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6571 write_xdmf_file (const std::vector<XDMFEntry> &entries,
6572  const std::string &filename,
6573  MPI_Comm comm) const
6574 {
6575  int myrank;
6576 
6577 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6578  const int ierr = MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myrank);
6579  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6580 #else
6581  (void)comm;
6582  myrank = 0;
6583 #endif
6584 
6585  // Only rank 0 process writes the XDMF file
6586  if (myrank == 0)
6587  {
6588  std::ofstream xdmf_file(filename.c_str());
6589  std::vector<XDMFEntry>::const_iterator it;
6590 
6591  xdmf_file << "<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\n";
6592  xdmf_file << "<!DOCTYPE Xdmf SYSTEM \"Xdmf.dtd\" []>\n";
6593  xdmf_file << "<Xdmf Version=\"2.0\">\n";
6594  xdmf_file << " <Domain>\n";
6595  xdmf_file << " <Grid Name=\"CellTime\" GridType=\"Collection\" CollectionType=\"Temporal\">\n";
6596 
6597  // Write out all the entries indented
6598  for (it=entries.begin(); it!=entries.end(); ++it)
6599  xdmf_file << it->get_xdmf_content(3);
6600 
6601  xdmf_file << " </Grid>\n";
6602  xdmf_file << " </Domain>\n";
6603  xdmf_file << "</Xdmf>\n";
6604 
6605  xdmf_file.close();
6606  }
6607 }
6608 
6609 
6610 /*
6611  * Get the XDMF content associated with this entry.
6612  * If the entry is not valid, this returns an empty string.
6613  */
6614 std::string XDMFEntry::get_xdmf_content(const unsigned int indent_level) const
6615 {
6616  std::stringstream ss;
6617  std::map<std::string, unsigned int>::const_iterator it;
6618 
6619  if (!valid) return "";
6620 
6621  ss << indent(indent_level+0) << "<Grid Name=\"mesh\" GridType=\"Uniform\">\n";
6622  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "<Time Value=\"" << entry_time << "\"/>\n";
6623  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "<Geometry GeometryType=\"" << (dimension == 2 ? "XY" : "XYZ" ) << "\">\n";
6624  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "<DataItem Dimensions=\"" << num_nodes << " " << dimension << "\" NumberType=\"Float\" Precision=\"8\" Format=\"HDF\">\n";
6625  ss << indent(indent_level+3) << h5_mesh_filename << ":/nodes\n";
6626  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "</DataItem>\n";
6627  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "</Geometry>\n";
6628  // If we have cells defined, use a quadrilateral (2D) or hexahedron (3D) topology
6629  if (num_cells > 0)
6630  {
6631  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "<Topology TopologyType=\"" << (dimension == 2 ? "Quadrilateral" : "Hexahedron") << "\" NumberOfElements=\"" << num_cells << "\">\n";
6632  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "<DataItem Dimensions=\"" << num_cells << " " << (2 << (dimension-1)) << "\" NumberType=\"UInt\" Format=\"HDF\">\n";
6633  ss << indent(indent_level+3) << h5_mesh_filename << ":/cells\n";
6634  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "</DataItem>\n";
6635  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "</Topology>\n";
6636  }
6637  else
6638  {
6639  // Otherwise, we assume the points are isolated in space and use a Polyvertex topology
6640  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "<Topology TopologyType=\"Polyvertex\" NumberOfElements=\"" << num_nodes << "\">\n";
6641  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "</Topology>\n";
6642  }
6643 
6644  for (it=attribute_dims.begin(); it!=attribute_dims.end(); ++it)
6645  {
6646  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "<Attribute Name=\"" << it->first << "\" AttributeType=\"" << (it->second > 1 ? "Vector" : "Scalar") << "\" Center=\"Node\">\n";
6647  // Vectors must have 3 elements even for 2D models
6648  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "<DataItem Dimensions=\"" << num_nodes << " " << (it->second > 1 ? 3 : 1) << "\" NumberType=\"Float\" Precision=\"8\" Format=\"HDF\">\n";
6649  ss << indent(indent_level+3) << h5_sol_filename << ":/" << it->first << "\n";
6650  ss << indent(indent_level+2) << "</DataItem>\n";
6651  ss << indent(indent_level+1) << "</Attribute>\n";
6652  }
6653 
6654  ss << indent(indent_level+0) << "</Grid>\n";
6655 
6656  return ss.str();
6657 }
6658 
6659 /*
6660  * Write the data in this DataOutInterface to a DataOutFilter object.
6661  * Filtering is performed based on the DataOutFilter flags.
6662  */
6663 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6664 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6665 write_filtered_data (DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &filtered_data) const
6666 {
6667  DataOutBase::write_filtered_data(get_patches(), get_dataset_names(),
6668  get_vector_data_ranges(),
6669  filtered_data);
6670 }
6671 
6672 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6673 void DataOutBase::write_filtered_data (const std::vector<Patch<dim,spacedim> > &patches,
6674  const std::vector<std::string> &data_names,
6675  const std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> > &vector_data_ranges,
6676  DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &filtered_data)
6677 {
6678  const unsigned int n_data_sets = data_names.size();
6679  unsigned int n_node, n_cell;
6680  Table<2,double> data_vectors;
6681  Threads::Task<> reorder_task;
6682 
6683 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6684  // verify that there are indeed
6685  // patches to be written out. most
6686  // of the times, people just forget
6687  // to call build_patches when there
6688  // are no patches, so a warning is
6689  // in order. that said, the
6690  // assertion is disabled if we
6691  // support MPI since then it can
6692  // happen that on the coarsest
6693  // mesh, a processor simply has no
6694  // cells it actually owns, and in
6695  // that case it is legit if there
6696  // are no patches
6697  Assert (patches.size() > 0, ExcNoPatches());
6698 #endif
6699 
6700  compute_sizes<dim,spacedim>(patches, n_node, n_cell);
6701 
6702  data_vectors = Table<2,double> (n_data_sets, n_node);
6703  void (*fun_ptr) (const std::vector<Patch<dim,spacedim> > &, Table<2,double> &) = &DataOutBase::template write_gmv_reorder_data_vectors<dim,spacedim>;
6704  reorder_task = Threads::new_task (fun_ptr, patches, data_vectors);
6705 
6706  // Write the nodes/cells to the DataOutFilter object.
6707  write_nodes(patches, filtered_data);
6708  write_cells(patches, filtered_data);
6709 
6710  // Ensure reordering is done before we output data set values
6711  reorder_task.join ();
6712 
6713  // when writing, first write out
6714  // all vector data, then handle the
6715  // scalar data sets that have been
6716  // left over
6717  unsigned int i, n_th_vector, data_set, pt_data_vector_dim;
6718  std::string vector_name;
6719  for (n_th_vector=0,data_set=0; data_set<n_data_sets;)
6720  {
6721  // Advance n_th_vector to at least the current data set we are on
6722  while (n_th_vector < vector_data_ranges.size() && std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) < data_set) n_th_vector++;
6723 
6724  // Determine the dimension of this data
6725  if (n_th_vector < vector_data_ranges.size() && std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) == data_set)
6726  {
6727  // Multiple dimensions
6728  pt_data_vector_dim = std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) - std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector])+1;
6729 
6730  // Ensure the dimensionality of the data is correct
6731  AssertThrow (std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) >= std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]),
6732  ExcLowerRange (std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]), std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector])));
6733  AssertThrow (std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) < n_data_sets,
6734  ExcIndexRange (std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]), 0, n_data_sets));
6735 
6736  // Determine the vector name
6737  // Concatenate all the
6738  // component names with double
6739  // underscores unless a vector
6740  // name has been specified
6741  if (std::get<2>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]) != "")
6742  {
6743  vector_name = std::get<2>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]);
6744  }
6745  else
6746  {
6747  vector_name = "";
6748  for (i=std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]); i<std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector]); ++i)
6749  vector_name += data_names[i] + "__";
6750  vector_name += data_names[std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[n_th_vector])];
6751  }
6752  }
6753  else
6754  {
6755  // One dimension
6756  pt_data_vector_dim = 1;
6757  vector_name = data_names[data_set];
6758  }
6759 
6760  // Write data to the filter object
6761  filtered_data.write_data_set(vector_name, pt_data_vector_dim, data_set, data_vectors);
6762 
6763  // Advance the current data set
6764  data_set += pt_data_vector_dim;
6765  }
6766 }
6767 
6768 
6769 
6770 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6771 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6772 write_hdf5_parallel (const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6773  const std::string &filename, MPI_Comm comm) const
6774 {
6775  DataOutBase::write_hdf5_parallel(get_patches(), data_filter, filename, comm);
6776 }
6777 
6778 
6779 
6780 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6781 void DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
6782 write_hdf5_parallel (const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6783  const bool write_mesh_file, const std::string &mesh_filename, const std::string &solution_filename, MPI_Comm comm) const
6784 {
6785  DataOutBase::write_hdf5_parallel(get_patches(), data_filter, write_mesh_file, mesh_filename, solution_filename, comm);
6786 }
6787 
6788 
6789 
6790 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6791 void DataOutBase::write_hdf5_parallel (const std::vector<Patch<dim,spacedim> > &patches,
6792  const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6793  const std::string &filename,
6794  MPI_Comm comm)
6795 {
6796  write_hdf5_parallel(patches, data_filter, true, filename, filename, comm);
6797 }
6798 
6799 
6800 
6801 template <int dim, int spacedim>
6802 void DataOutBase::write_hdf5_parallel (const std::vector<Patch<dim,spacedim> > &/*patches*/,
6803  const DataOutBase::DataOutFilter &data_filter,
6804  const bool write_mesh_file,
6805  const std::string &mesh_filename,
6806  const std::string &solution_filename,
6807  MPI_Comm comm)
6808 {
6809  int ierr;
6810  (void)ierr;
6811 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_HDF5
6812  // throw an exception, but first make
6813  // sure the compiler does not warn about
6814  // the now unused function arguments
6815  (void)data_filter;
6816  (void)write_mesh_file;
6817  (void)mesh_filename;
6818  (void)solution_filename;
6819  (void)comm;
6820  AssertThrow(false, ExcMessage ("HDF5 support is disabled."));
6821 #else
6822 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6823  // verify that there are indeed
6824  // patches to be written out. most
6825  // of the times, people just forget
6826  // to call build_patches when there
6827  // are no patches, so a warning is
6828  // in order. that said, the
6829  // assertion is disabled if we
6830  // support MPI since then it can
6831  // happen that on the coarsest
6832  // mesh, a processor simply has no
6833  // cells it actually owns, and in
6834  // that case it is legit if there
6835  // are no patches
6836  Assert (data_filter.n_nodes() > 0, ExcNoPatches());
6837 #else
6838  hid_t h5_mesh_file_id=-1, h5_solution_file_id, file_plist_id, plist_id;
6839  hid_t node_dataspace, node_dataset, node_file_dataspace, node_memory_dataspace;
6840  hid_t cell_dataspace, cell_dataset, cell_file_dataspace, cell_memory_dataspace;
6841  hid_t pt_data_dataspace, pt_data_dataset, pt_data_file_dataspace, pt_data_memory_dataspace;
6842  herr_t status;
6843  unsigned int local_node_cell_count[2], global_node_cell_count[2], global_node_cell_offsets[2];
6844  hsize_t count[2], offset[2], node_ds_dim[2], cell_ds_dim[2];
6845  std::vector<double> node_data_vec;
6846  std::vector<unsigned int> cell_data_vec;
6847 
6848  // If HDF5 is not parallel and we're using multiple processes, abort
6849 #ifndef H5_HAVE_PARALLEL
6850 # ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6851  int world_size;
6852  ierr = MPI_Comm_size(comm, &world_size);
6853  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6854  AssertThrow (world_size <= 1,
6855  ExcMessage ("Serial HDF5 output on multiple processes is not yet supported."));
6856 # endif
6857 #endif
6858 
6859  local_node_cell_count[0] = data_filter.n_nodes();
6860  local_node_cell_count[1] = data_filter.n_cells();
6861 
6862  // Create file access properties
6863  file_plist_id = H5Pcreate(H5P_FILE_ACCESS);
6864  AssertThrow(file_plist_id != -1, ExcIO());
6865  // If MPI is enabled *and* HDF5 is parallel, we can do parallel output
6866 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6867 #ifdef H5_HAVE_PARALLEL
6868  // Set the access to use the specified MPI_Comm object
6869  status = H5Pset_fapl_mpio(file_plist_id, comm, MPI_INFO_NULL);
6870  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6871 #endif
6872 #endif
6873 
6874  // Compute the global total number of nodes/cells
6875  // And determine the offset of the data for this process
6876 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6877  ierr = MPI_Allreduce(local_node_cell_count, global_node_cell_count, 2, MPI_UNSIGNED, MPI_SUM, comm);
6878  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6879  ierr = MPI_Scan(local_node_cell_count, global_node_cell_offsets, 2, MPI_UNSIGNED, MPI_SUM, comm);
6880  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6881  global_node_cell_offsets[0] -= local_node_cell_count[0];
6882  global_node_cell_offsets[1] -= local_node_cell_count[1];
6883 #else
6884  global_node_cell_offsets[0] = global_node_cell_offsets[1] = 0;
6885 #endif
6886 
6887  // Create the property list for a collective write
6888  plist_id = H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_XFER);
6889  AssertThrow(plist_id >= 0, ExcIO());
6890 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6891 #ifdef H5_HAVE_PARALLEL
6892  status = H5Pset_dxpl_mpio(plist_id, H5FD_MPIO_COLLECTIVE);
6893  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6894 #endif
6895 #endif
6896 
6897  if (write_mesh_file)
6898  {
6899  // Overwrite any existing files (change this to an option?)
6900  h5_mesh_file_id = H5Fcreate(mesh_filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_TRUNC, H5P_DEFAULT, file_plist_id);
6901  AssertThrow(h5_mesh_file_id >= 0, ExcIO());
6902 
6903  // Create the dataspace for the nodes and cells
6904  node_ds_dim[0] = global_node_cell_count[0];
6905  node_ds_dim[1] = dim;
6906  node_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, node_ds_dim, NULL);
6907  AssertThrow(node_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6908 
6909  cell_ds_dim[0] = global_node_cell_count[1];
6910  cell_ds_dim[1] = GeometryInfo<dim>::vertices_per_cell;
6911  cell_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, cell_ds_dim, NULL);
6912  AssertThrow(cell_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6913 
6914  // Create the dataset for the nodes and cells
6915 #if H5Gcreate_vers == 1
6916  node_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_mesh_file_id, "nodes", H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, node_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT);
6917 #else
6918  node_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_mesh_file_id, "nodes", H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, node_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
6919 #endif
6920  AssertThrow(node_dataset >= 0, ExcIO());
6921 #if H5Gcreate_vers == 1
6922  cell_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_mesh_file_id, "cells", H5T_NATIVE_UINT, cell_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT);
6923 #else
6924  cell_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_mesh_file_id, "cells", H5T_NATIVE_UINT, cell_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
6925 #endif
6926  AssertThrow(cell_dataset >= 0, ExcIO());
6927 
6928  // Close the node and cell dataspaces since we're done with them
6929  status = H5Sclose(node_dataspace);
6930  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6931  status = H5Sclose(cell_dataspace);
6932  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6933 
6934  // Create the data subset we'll use to read from memory
6935  count[0] = local_node_cell_count[0];
6936  count[1] = dim;
6937  offset[0] = global_node_cell_offsets[0];
6938  offset[1] = 0;
6939  node_memory_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, count, NULL);
6940  AssertThrow(node_memory_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6941 
6942  // Select the hyperslab in the file
6943  node_file_dataspace = H5Dget_space(node_dataset);
6944  AssertThrow(node_file_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6945  status = H5Sselect_hyperslab(node_file_dataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, NULL, count, NULL);
6946  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6947 
6948  // And repeat for cells
6949  count[0] = local_node_cell_count[1];
6950  count[1] = GeometryInfo<dim>::vertices_per_cell;
6951  offset[0] = global_node_cell_offsets[1];
6952  offset[1] = 0;
6953  cell_memory_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, count, NULL);
6954  AssertThrow(cell_memory_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6955 
6956  cell_file_dataspace = H5Dget_space(cell_dataset);
6957  AssertThrow(cell_file_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
6958  status = H5Sselect_hyperslab(cell_file_dataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, NULL, count, NULL);
6959  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6960 
6961  // And finally, write the node data
6962  data_filter.fill_node_data(node_data_vec);
6963  status = H5Dwrite(node_dataset, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, node_memory_dataspace, node_file_dataspace, plist_id, &node_data_vec[0]);
6964  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6965  node_data_vec.clear();
6966 
6967  // And the cell data
6968  data_filter.fill_cell_data(global_node_cell_offsets[0], cell_data_vec);
6969  status = H5Dwrite(cell_dataset, H5T_NATIVE_UINT, cell_memory_dataspace, cell_file_dataspace, plist_id, &cell_data_vec[0]);
6970  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6971  cell_data_vec.clear();
6972 
6973  // Close the file dataspaces
6974  status = H5Sclose(node_file_dataspace);
6975  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6976  status = H5Sclose(cell_file_dataspace);
6977  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6978 
6979  // Close the memory dataspaces
6980  status = H5Sclose(node_memory_dataspace);
6981  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6982  status = H5Sclose(cell_memory_dataspace);
6983  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6984 
6985  // Close the datasets
6986  status = H5Dclose(node_dataset);
6987  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6988  status = H5Dclose(cell_dataset);
6989  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6990 
6991  // If the filenames are different, we need to close the mesh file
6992  if (mesh_filename != solution_filename)
6993  {
6994  status = H5Fclose(h5_mesh_file_id);
6995  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
6996  }
6997  }
6998 
6999  // If the filenames are identical, continue with the same file
7000  if (mesh_filename == solution_filename && write_mesh_file)
7001  {
7002  h5_solution_file_id = h5_mesh_file_id;
7003  }
7004  else
7005  {
7006  // Otherwise we need to open a new file
7007  h5_solution_file_id = H5Fcreate(solution_filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_TRUNC, H5P_DEFAULT, file_plist_id);
7008  AssertThrow(h5_solution_file_id >= 0, ExcIO());
7009  }
7010 
7011  // when writing, first write out
7012  // all vector data, then handle the
7013  // scalar data sets that have been
7014  // left over
7015  unsigned int i;
7016  std::string vector_name;
7017  for (i=0; i<data_filter.n_data_sets(); ++i)
7018  {
7019  // Allocate space for the point data
7020  // Must be either 1D or 3D
7021  const unsigned int pt_data_vector_dim = data_filter.get_data_set_dim(i);
7022  vector_name = data_filter.get_data_set_name(i);
7023 
7024  // Create the dataspace for the point data
7025  node_ds_dim[0] = global_node_cell_count[0];
7026  node_ds_dim[1] = pt_data_vector_dim;
7027  pt_data_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, node_ds_dim, NULL);
7028  AssertThrow(pt_data_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
7029 
7030 #if H5Gcreate_vers == 1
7031  pt_data_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_solution_file_id, vector_name.c_str(), H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, pt_data_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT);
7032 #else
7033  pt_data_dataset = H5Dcreate(h5_solution_file_id, vector_name.c_str(), H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, pt_data_dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT);
7034 #endif
7035  AssertThrow(pt_data_dataset >= 0, ExcIO());
7036 
7037  // Create the data subset we'll use to read from memory
7038  count[0] = local_node_cell_count[0];
7039  count[1] = pt_data_vector_dim;
7040  offset[0] = global_node_cell_offsets[0];
7041  offset[1] = 0;
7042  pt_data_memory_dataspace = H5Screate_simple(2, count, NULL);
7043  AssertThrow(pt_data_memory_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
7044 
7045  // Select the hyperslab in the file
7046  pt_data_file_dataspace = H5Dget_space(pt_data_dataset);
7047  AssertThrow(pt_data_file_dataspace >= 0, ExcIO());
7048  status = H5Sselect_hyperslab(pt_data_file_dataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, NULL, count, NULL);
7049  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7050 
7051  // And finally, write the data
7052  status = H5Dwrite(pt_data_dataset, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, pt_data_memory_dataspace, pt_data_file_dataspace, plist_id, data_filter.get_data_set(i));
7053  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7054 
7055  // Close the dataspaces
7056  status = H5Sclose(pt_data_dataspace);
7057  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7058  status = H5Sclose(pt_data_memory_dataspace);
7059  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7060  status = H5Sclose(pt_data_file_dataspace);
7061  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7062  // Close the dataset
7063  status = H5Dclose(pt_data_dataset);
7064  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7065  }
7066 
7067  // Close the file property list
7068  status = H5Pclose(file_plist_id);
7069  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7070 
7071  // Close the parallel access
7072  status = H5Pclose(plist_id);
7073  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7074 
7075  // Close the file
7076  status = H5Fclose(h5_solution_file_id);
7077  AssertThrow(status >= 0, ExcIO());
7078 #endif
7079 #endif
7080 }
7081 
7082 
7083 
7084 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7085 void
7086 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::write (std::ostream &out,
7087  const DataOutBase::OutputFormat output_format_) const
7088 {
7089  DataOutBase::OutputFormat output_format = output_format_;
7090  if (output_format == DataOutBase::default_format)
7091  output_format = default_fmt;
7092 
7093  switch (output_format)
7094  {
7095  case DataOutBase::none:
7096  break;
7097 
7098  case DataOutBase::dx:
7099  write_dx (out);
7100  break;
7101 
7102  case DataOutBase::ucd:
7103  write_ucd (out);
7104  break;
7105 
7106  case DataOutBase::gnuplot:
7107  write_gnuplot (out);
7108  break;
7109 
7110  case DataOutBase::povray:
7111  write_povray (out);
7112  break;
7113 
7114  case DataOutBase::eps:
7115  write_eps (out);
7116  break;
7117 
7118  case DataOutBase::gmv:
7119  write_gmv (out);
7120  break;
7121 
7122  case DataOutBase::tecplot:
7123  write_tecplot (out);
7124  break;
7125 
7126  case DataOutBase::tecplot_binary:
7127  write_tecplot_binary (out);
7128  break;
7129 
7130  case DataOutBase::vtk:
7131  write_vtk (out);
7132  break;
7133 
7134  case DataOutBase::vtu:
7135  write_vtu (out);
7136  break;
7137 
7138  case DataOutBase::svg:
7139  write_svg (out);
7140  break;
7141 
7142  case DataOutBase::deal_II_intermediate:
7143  write_deal_II_intermediate (out);
7144  break;
7145 
7146  default:
7147  Assert (false, ExcNotImplemented());
7148  }
7149 }
7150 
7151 
7152 
7153 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7154 void
7155 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::set_default_format(const DataOutBase::OutputFormat fmt)
7156 {
7157  Assert (fmt != DataOutBase::default_format, ExcNotImplemented());
7158  default_fmt = fmt;
7159 }
7160 
7161 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7162 template <typename FlagType>
7163 void
7164 DataOutInterface<dim, spacedim>::set_flags (const FlagType &flags)
7165 {
7166  // The price for not writing ten duplicates of this function is some loss in
7167  // type safety.
7168  if (typeid(flags) == typeid(dx_flags))
7169  dx_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::DXFlags *>(&flags);
7170  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(ucd_flags))
7171  ucd_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::UcdFlags *>(&flags);
7172  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(povray_flags))
7173  povray_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::PovrayFlags *>(&flags);
7174  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(eps_flags))
7175  eps_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::EpsFlags *>(&flags);
7176  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(gmv_flags))
7177  gmv_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::GmvFlags *>(&flags);
7178  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(tecplot_flags))
7179  tecplot_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::TecplotFlags *>(&flags);
7180  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(vtk_flags))
7181  vtk_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::VtkFlags *>(&flags);
7182  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(svg_flags))
7183  svg_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::SvgFlags *>(&flags);
7184  else if (typeid(flags) == typeid(deal_II_intermediate_flags))
7185  deal_II_intermediate_flags = *reinterpret_cast<const DataOutBase::Deal_II_IntermediateFlags *>(&flags);
7186  else
7187  Assert(false, ExcNotImplemented());
7188 }
7189 
7190 
7191 
7192 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7193 std::string
7194 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
7195 default_suffix (const DataOutBase::OutputFormat output_format) const
7196 {
7197  if (output_format == DataOutBase::default_format)
7198  return DataOutBase::default_suffix (default_fmt);
7199  else
7200  return DataOutBase::default_suffix (output_format);
7201 }
7202 
7203 
7204 
7205 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7206 void
7207 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::declare_parameters (ParameterHandler &prm)
7208 {
7209  prm.declare_entry ("Output format", "gnuplot",
7210  Patterns::Selection (DataOutBase::get_output_format_names ()),
7211  "A name for the output format to be used");
7212  prm.declare_entry("Subdivisions", "1", Patterns::Integer(),
7213  "Number of subdivisions of each mesh cell");
7214 
7215  prm.enter_subsection ("DX output parameters");
7216  DataOutBase::DXFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7217  prm.leave_subsection ();
7218 
7219  prm.enter_subsection ("UCD output parameters");
7220  DataOutBase::UcdFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7221  prm.leave_subsection ();
7222 
7223  prm.enter_subsection ("Gnuplot output parameters");
7224  DataOutBase::GnuplotFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7225  prm.leave_subsection ();
7226 
7227  prm.enter_subsection ("Povray output parameters");
7228  DataOutBase::PovrayFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7229  prm.leave_subsection ();
7230 
7231  prm.enter_subsection ("Eps output parameters");
7232  DataOutBase::EpsFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7233  prm.leave_subsection ();
7234 
7235  prm.enter_subsection ("Gmv output parameters");
7236  DataOutBase::GmvFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7237  prm.leave_subsection ();
7238 
7239  prm.enter_subsection ("Tecplot output parameters");
7240  DataOutBase::TecplotFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7241  prm.leave_subsection ();
7242 
7243  prm.enter_subsection ("Vtk output parameters");
7244  DataOutBase::VtkFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7245  prm.leave_subsection ();
7246 
7247 
7248  prm.enter_subsection ("deal.II intermediate output parameters");
7249  DataOutBase::Deal_II_IntermediateFlags::declare_parameters (prm);
7250  prm.leave_subsection ();
7251 }
7252 
7253 
7254 
7255 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7256 void
7257 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::parse_parameters (ParameterHandler &prm)
7258 {
7259  const std::string &output_name = prm.get ("Output format");
7260  default_fmt = DataOutBase::parse_output_format (output_name);
7261  default_subdivisions = prm.get_integer ("Subdivisions");
7262 
7263  prm.enter_subsection ("DX output parameters");
7264  dx_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7265  prm.leave_subsection ();
7266 
7267  prm.enter_subsection ("UCD output parameters");
7268  ucd_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7269  prm.leave_subsection ();
7270 
7271  prm.enter_subsection ("Gnuplot output parameters");
7272  gnuplot_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7273  prm.leave_subsection ();
7274 
7275  prm.enter_subsection ("Povray output parameters");
7276  povray_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7277  prm.leave_subsection ();
7278 
7279  prm.enter_subsection ("Eps output parameters");
7280  eps_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7281  prm.leave_subsection ();
7282 
7283  prm.enter_subsection ("Gmv output parameters");
7284  gmv_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7285  prm.leave_subsection ();
7286 
7287  prm.enter_subsection ("Tecplot output parameters");
7288  tecplot_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7289  prm.leave_subsection ();
7290 
7291  prm.enter_subsection ("Vtk output parameters");
7292  vtk_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7293  prm.leave_subsection ();
7294 
7295  prm.enter_subsection ("deal.II intermediate output parameters");
7296  deal_II_intermediate_flags.parse_parameters (prm);
7297  prm.leave_subsection ();
7298 }
7299 
7300 
7301 
7302 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7303 std::size_t
7304 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::memory_consumption () const
7305 {
7306  return (sizeof (default_fmt) +
7307  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (dx_flags) +
7308  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (ucd_flags) +
7309  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (gnuplot_flags) +
7310  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (povray_flags) +
7311  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (eps_flags) +
7312  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (gmv_flags) +
7313  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (tecplot_flags) +
7314  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (vtk_flags) +
7315  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (svg_flags) +
7316  MemoryConsumption::memory_consumption (deal_II_intermediate_flags));
7317 }
7318 
7319 
7320 
7321 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7322 std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> >
7323 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::get_vector_data_ranges () const
7324 {
7325  return std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> >();
7326 }
7327 
7328 
7329 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7330 void
7331 DataOutInterface<dim,spacedim>::
7332 validate_dataset_names () const
7333 {
7334 #ifdef DEBUG
7335  {
7336  // Check that names for datasets are only used once. This is somewhat
7337  // complicated, because vector ranges might have a name or not.
7338  std::set<std::string> all_names;
7339 
7340  const std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> >
7341  ranges = this->get_vector_data_ranges();
7342  const std::vector<std::string> data_names = this->get_dataset_names();
7343  const unsigned int n_data_sets = data_names.size();
7344  std::vector<bool> data_set_written (n_data_sets, false);
7345 
7346  for (unsigned int n_th_vector=0; n_th_vector<ranges.size(); ++n_th_vector)
7347  {
7348  const std::string &name = std::get<2>(ranges[n_th_vector]);
7349  if (name != "")
7350  {
7351  Assert(all_names.find(name) == all_names.end(),
7352  ExcMessage("Error: names of fields in DataOut need to be unique, "
7353  "but '" + name + "' is used more than once."));
7354  all_names.insert(name);
7355  for (unsigned int i=std::get<0>(ranges[n_th_vector]);
7356  i<=std::get<1>(ranges[n_th_vector]);
7357  ++i)
7358  data_set_written[i] = true;
7359  }
7360  }
7361 
7362  for (unsigned int data_set=0; data_set<n_data_sets; ++data_set)
7363  if (data_set_written[data_set] == false)
7364  {
7365  const std::string &name = data_names[data_set];
7366  Assert(all_names.find(name) == all_names.end(),
7367  ExcMessage("Error: names of fields in DataOut need to be unique, "
7368  "but '" + name + "' is used more than once."));
7369  all_names.insert(name);
7370  }
7371  }
7372 #endif
7373 }
7374 
7375 
7376 
7377 // ---------------------------------------------- DataOutReader ----------
7378 
7379 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7380 void
7381 DataOutReader<dim,spacedim>::read (std::istream &in)
7382 {
7383  AssertThrow (in, ExcIO());
7384 
7385  // first empty previous content
7386  {
7387  std::vector<typename ::DataOutBase::Patch<dim,spacedim> >
7388  tmp;
7389  tmp.swap (patches);
7390  }
7391  {
7392  std::vector<std::string> tmp;
7393  tmp.swap (dataset_names);
7394  }
7395  {
7396  std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> > tmp;
7397  tmp.swap (vector_data_ranges);
7398  }
7399 
7400  // then check that we have the
7401  // correct header of this
7402  // file. both the first and second
7403  // real lines have to match, as
7404  // well as the dimension
7405  // information written before that
7406  // and the Version information
7407  // written in the third line
7408  {
7409  std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>
7410  dimension_info
7411  = DataOutBase::determine_intermediate_format_dimensions (in);
7412  AssertThrow ((dimension_info.first == dim) &&
7413  (dimension_info.second == spacedim),
7414  ExcIncompatibleDimensions (dimension_info.first, dim,
7415  dimension_info.second, spacedim));
7416 
7417  // read to the end of the line
7418  std::string tmp;
7419  getline (in, tmp);
7420  }
7421 
7422  {
7423  std::string header;
7424  getline (in, header);
7425 
7426  std::ostringstream s;
7427  s << "[deal.II intermediate format graphics data]";
7428 
7429  Assert (header == s.str(), ExcUnexpectedInput(s.str(),header));
7430  }
7431  {
7432  std::string header;
7433  getline (in, header);
7434 
7435  std::ostringstream s;
7436  s << "[written by " << DEAL_II_PACKAGE_NAME << " " << DEAL_II_PACKAGE_VERSION << "]";
7437 
7438  Assert (header == s.str(), ExcUnexpectedInput(s.str(),header));
7439  }
7440  {
7441  std::string header;
7442  getline (in, header);
7443 
7444  std::ostringstream s;
7445  s << "[Version: " << ::DataOutBase::Deal_II_IntermediateFlags::format_version << "]";
7446 
7447  Assert (header == s.str(),
7448  ExcMessage("Invalid or incompatible file format. Intermediate format "
7449  "files can only be read by the same deal.II version as they "
7450  "are written by."));
7451  }
7452 
7453  // then read the rest of the data
7454  unsigned int n_datasets;
7455  in >> n_datasets;
7456  dataset_names.resize (n_datasets);
7457  for (unsigned int i=0; i<n_datasets; ++i)
7458  in >> dataset_names[i];
7459 
7460  unsigned int n_patches;
7461  in >> n_patches;
7462  patches.resize (n_patches);
7463  for (unsigned int i=0; i<n_patches; ++i)
7464  in >> patches[i];
7465 
7466  unsigned int n_vector_data_ranges;
7467  in >> n_vector_data_ranges;
7468  vector_data_ranges.resize (n_vector_data_ranges);
7469  for (unsigned int i=0; i<n_vector_data_ranges; ++i)
7470  {
7471  in >> std::get<0>(vector_data_ranges[i])
7472  >> std::get<1>(vector_data_ranges[i]);
7473 
7474  // read in the name of that vector
7475  // range. because it is on a separate
7476  // line, we first need to read to the
7477  // end of the previous line (nothing
7478  // should be there any more after we've
7479  // read the previous two integers) and
7480  // then read the entire next line for
7481  // the name
7482  std::string name;
7483  getline(in, name);
7484  getline(in, name);
7485  std::get<2>(vector_data_ranges[i]) = name;
7486  }
7487 
7488  AssertThrow (in, ExcIO());
7489 }
7490 
7491 
7492 
7493 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7494 void
7495 DataOutReader<dim,spacedim>::
7496 merge (const DataOutReader<dim,spacedim> &source)
7497 {
7498  typedef typename ::DataOutBase::Patch<dim,spacedim> Patch;
7499 
7500 
7501  const std::vector<Patch> source_patches = source.get_patches ();
7502  Assert (patches.size () != 0, DataOutBase::ExcNoPatches ());
7503  Assert (source_patches.size () != 0, DataOutBase::ExcNoPatches ());
7504  // check equality of component
7505  // names
7506  Assert (get_dataset_names() == source.get_dataset_names(),
7507  ExcIncompatibleDatasetNames());
7508 
7509  // check equality of the vector data
7510  // specifications
7511  Assert (get_vector_data_ranges().size() ==
7512  source.get_vector_data_ranges().size(),
7513  ExcMessage ("Both sources need to declare the same components "
7514  "as vectors."));
7515  for (unsigned int i=0; i<get_vector_data_ranges().size(); ++i)
7516  {
7517  Assert (std::get<0>(get_vector_data_ranges()[i]) ==
7518  std::get<0>(source.get_vector_data_ranges()[i]),
7519  ExcMessage ("Both sources need to declare the same components "
7520  "as vectors."));
7521  Assert (std::get<1>(get_vector_data_ranges()[i]) ==
7522  std::get<1>(source.get_vector_data_ranges()[i]),
7523  ExcMessage ("Both sources need to declare the same components "
7524  "as vectors."));
7525  Assert (std::get<2>(get_vector_data_ranges()[i]) ==
7526  std::get<2>(source.get_vector_data_ranges()[i]),
7527  ExcMessage ("Both sources need to declare the same components "
7528  "as vectors."));
7529  }
7530 
7531  // make sure patches are compatible
7532  Assert (patches[0].n_subdivisions == source_patches[0].n_subdivisions,
7533  ExcIncompatiblePatchLists());
7534  Assert (patches[0].data.n_rows() == source_patches[0].data.n_rows(),
7535  ExcIncompatiblePatchLists());
7536  Assert (patches[0].data.n_cols() == source_patches[0].data.n_cols(),
7537  ExcIncompatiblePatchLists());
7538 
7539  // merge patches. store old number
7540  // of elements, since we need to
7541  // adjust patch numbers, etc
7542  // afterwards
7543  const unsigned int old_n_patches = patches.size();
7544  patches.insert (patches.end(),
7545  source_patches.begin(),
7546  source_patches.end());
7547 
7548  // adjust patch numbers
7549  for (unsigned int i=old_n_patches; i<patches.size(); ++i)
7550  patches[i].patch_index += old_n_patches;
7551 
7552  // adjust patch neighbors
7553  for (unsigned int i=old_n_patches; i<patches.size(); ++i)
7554  for (unsigned int n=0; n<GeometryInfo<dim>::faces_per_cell; ++n)
7555  if (patches[i].neighbors[n] != ::DataOutBase::Patch<dim,spacedim>::no_neighbor)
7556  patches[i].neighbors[n] += old_n_patches;
7557 }
7558 
7559 
7560 
7561 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7562 const std::vector<typename ::DataOutBase::Patch<dim,spacedim> > &
7563 DataOutReader<dim,spacedim>::get_patches () const
7564 {
7565  return patches;
7566 }
7567 
7568 
7569 
7570 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7571 std::vector<std::string>
7572 DataOutReader<dim,spacedim>::get_dataset_names () const
7573 {
7574  return dataset_names;
7575 }
7576 
7577 
7578 
7579 template <int dim, int spacedim>
7580 std::vector<std::tuple<unsigned int, unsigned int, std::string> >
7581 DataOutReader<dim,spacedim>::get_vector_data_ranges () const
7582 {
7583  return vector_data_ranges;
7584 }
7585 
7586 
7587 
7588 namespace DataOutBase
7589 {
7590  template <int dim, int spacedim>
7591  std::ostream &
7592  operator << (std::ostream &out,
7593  const Patch<dim,spacedim> &patch)
7594  {
7595  // write a header line
7596  out << "[deal.II intermediate Patch<" << dim << ',' << spacedim << ">]"
7597  << '\n';
7598 
7599  // then write all the data that is
7600  // in this patch
7601  for (unsigned int i=0; i<GeometryInfo<dim>::vertices_per_cell; ++i)
7602  out << patch.vertices[GeometryInfo<dim>::ucd_to_deal[i]] << ' ';
7603  out << '\n';
7604 
7605  for (unsigned int i=0; i<GeometryInfo<dim>::faces_per_cell; ++i)
7606  out << patch.neighbors[i] << ' ';
7607  out << '\n';
7608 
7609  out << patch.patch_index << ' ' << patch.n_subdivisions
7610  << '\n';
7611 
7612  out << patch.points_are_available<<'\n';
7613 
7614  out << patch.data.n_rows() << ' ' << patch.data.n_cols() << '\n';
7615  for (unsigned int i=0; i<patch.data.n_rows(); ++i)
7616  for (unsigned int j=0; j<patch.data.n_cols(); ++j)
7617  out << patch.data[i][j] << ' ';
7618  out << '\n';
7619  out << '\n';
7620 
7621  return out;
7622  }
7623 
7624 
7625  template <int dim, int spacedim>
7626  std::istream &
7627  operator >> (std::istream &in,
7628  Patch<dim,spacedim> &patch)
7629  {
7630  AssertThrow (in, ExcIO());
7631 
7632  // read a header line and compare
7633  // it to what we usually
7634  // write. skip all lines that
7635  // contain only blanks at the start
7636  {
7637  std::string header;
7638  do
7639  {
7640  getline (in, header);
7641  while ((header.size() != 0) &&
7642  (header[header.size()-1] == ' '))
7643  header.erase(header.size()-1);
7644  }
7645  while ((header == "") && in);
7646 
7647  std::ostringstream s;
7648  s << "[deal.II intermediate Patch<" << dim << ',' << spacedim << ">]";
7649 
7650  Assert (header == s.str(), ExcUnexpectedInput(s.str(),header));
7651  }
7652 
7653 
7654  // then read all the data that is
7655  // in this patch
7656  for (unsigned int i=0; i<GeometryInfo<dim>::vertices_per_cell; ++i)
7657  in >> patch.vertices[GeometryInfo<dim>::ucd_to_deal[i]];
7658 
7659  for (unsigned int i=0; i<GeometryInfo<dim>::faces_per_cell; ++i)
7660  in >> patch.neighbors[i];
7661 
7662  in >> patch.patch_index >> patch.n_subdivisions;
7663 
7664  in >> patch.points_are_available;
7665 
7666  unsigned int n_rows, n_cols;
7667  in >> n_rows >> n_cols;
7668  patch.data.reinit (n_rows, n_cols);
7669  for (unsigned int i=0; i<patch.data.n_rows(); ++i)
7670  for (unsigned int j=0; j<patch.data.n_cols(); ++j)
7671  in >> patch.data[i][j];
7672 
7673  AssertThrow (in, ExcIO());
7674 
7675  return in;
7676  }
7677 }
7678 
7679 
7680 
7681 // explicit instantiations
7682 #include "data_out_base.inst"
7683 
7684 DEAL_II_NAMESPACE_CLOSE
